acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should fill recursive POJOs when invoking the factory population directly
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldFillRecursivePojosWhenInvokingPopulationDirectly

tag.name: Basic types/Podam factory basic types test

test-step.description: When I invoke the pojo's population directly for uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.RecursivePojo@2257fadf
Then all the POJOs in the recursive hierarchy should be valid
